comments: Parameters are case insensitive and can be passed via the query string or request headers. Boolean values can be passed as 1, 0, true or false.

parameters.name: culture
parameters.description: Determines the culture/language in which to display the resulting resources. Defaults to en-US.

parameters.name: demo
parameters.description: Whether or not to show the "Demo" chevron on the top center of the header. Defaults to 0 (false).

parameters.name: env
parameters.description: The environment context to which the resources should be retrieved. Valid values are [local, dev, stg, prod]. Defaults to prod.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Overrides ione resource paths that are usually set via "env". I.e., myothercdn.example.com or http://force.http.com .

parameters.name: psid
parameters.description: The point solution identifier. Valid values are [mat, dmp, dash, analytics, creative, display, search, web, email, mobile].

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: Whether or not to pretty print resulting html resources. Defaults to 0 (false).

parameters.name: ttid
parameters.description: The html template type identifier. Valid values are [jade]. Default value is jade.

endpoints.description: Returns all resource data and compiled html.
Returns all template data that is used to generate the compiled meta html.
Returns all template data that is used to generate the compiled css html.
Returns all template data that is used to generate the compiled header html.
Returns all template data that is used to generate the compiled footer html.
Returns all template data that is used to generate the compiled js html.
Returns all template data that is used to generate each set of compiled html.
